customfov.general.staticfov.tooltip: Set to true to disable all vanilla FoV modifiers
customfov.general.superstaticfov.tooltip: Set to true to disable all FoV modifiers, including modded ones
customfov.general.flying.modifier.toolti: The modifier to multiply by the original FoV modifier

customfov.general.flying.minvalue.toolti: The minimum FoV flying modifier value

customfov.general.speed.sprinting.minval: The minimum FoV sprinting modifier value
customfov.general.speed.effects.tooltip: Configure speed potion effects FoV settings
customfov.general.speed.effects.modifier: The modifier to multiply by the original FoV modifier
